library:
<class name="perception/preprocessing" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
This node performs preprocessing steps on a raw camera image.

<class name="perception/lane_detection" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
The lane detection nodelet performs lane detection.

<class name="perception/extrinsic_calibration" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
Publishes extrinsic parameters

<class name="perception/pixelwise_mask_generation" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
Generates a pixelwise mask.

<class name="perception/parkinglot_mapping" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
creates a map of the parking lot (ir + camera)

<class name="perception/perpendicular_parking" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
Node for detection and localization of parking spots on the left part of the lane, that can be used for perpendicular parking

<class name="perception/qr_code_detection" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
Node to detect QR codes like the 'STOP' signal

<class name="perception/look_at" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
Node to look for specific road elements in specific areas, when demanded by the environmental model
